See also: Frühstücken

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Frühstück (“breakfast”) +‎ -en

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfʁyːˌʃtʏkən/
  • (Austria)
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

frühstücken (third-person singular simple present frühstückt, past tense frühstückte, past participle gefrühstückt, auxiliary haben)

  1. (intransitive) to have breakfast; breakfast (to eat the morning meal)
  2. (transitive) to breakfast on; have for breakfast (to eat as one's morning meal)
